title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Computation of scattering factor, structure factor and Fourier coefficients from the experimental data collected from photographic and counter methods; data analysis, statistical analysis; Wilson plot; phase problems; different methods of structural analysis; computation of pattern function and its analysis to structurally determine heavy atom positions. Structure factor calculation in different methods of analysis. Normal structure factor calculation and its applications to direct method. Least-squares refinements of crystal structure. Computation of bond length, bond angle and thermal parameters. Description of some protein structures.
